name: t04_static_dup_names
description: Multiple .c files define static functions with identical names. Tests oracle's ability to distinguish functions by CU/DIE when names collide.
oracle_pressure: Identical DW_AT_name across CUs: oracle must key by DIE offset, not name alone. Static functions with same name but different implementations per TU. LLM difficulty: stripped binary will have no names, but debug variant shows collisions
